messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: Springsteen is different from many other famous musicians. He is in his late 60s, but he still makes very popular new music. His concerts fill big stadiums, and he is still one of the best at what he does. This does not surprise me. He tells us the most important stories about our lives. When you listen to his album 'Born in the USA', those stories are still meaningful today.

metadata.feedback_text: FAIL. The word 'meaningful' is B2 level and is not explained. It must be replaced with a simpler alternative like 'important'. The sentence 'His concerts fill big stadiums, and he is still one of the best at what he does' is too long at 17 words. The phrase 'at what he does' is also too complex for the B1 level.

messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: Springsteen is different from many other famous musicians. He is in his late 60s, but he still makes very popular new music. His concerts fill big stadiums. He is still one of the best musicians. This does not surprise me. He tells us the most important stories about our lives. When you listen to his album 'Born in the USA', those stories are still important today.

metadata.feedback_text: The text is a perfect example of B1 writing. Sentences are short and clear. The vocabulary is entirely within the A1-A2 range, making it easily understandable. All facts from the original text are included correctly and without alteration.
